Introduction¶

Frow is a toolset for working with pdf documents built on top of pymupdf. The raison d’etre is to provide a general toolset for manipulating large volumes of pdfs for the purpose of education.

An example use case is in manipulating scanned examinations. Every page receives a unique id-mark with data encoded into a qr-code along with a bubble array for recording grades. Submitted pdfs are split according to grading jobs. After grading is complete the bubble arrays are read by frow, and the pdfs reconstituted.

See the examples for a demonstration of the basic uses of frow.
